mapper.select:
select
from address_tbl order by addid asc

select box_name, address, mar_lon as longitude, mar_lat as latitude from box_tbl where 1 = 1
and zone_name like concat(concat("%",#{zoneName}),"%")
and box_name like concat(concat("%",#{boxName}),"%")

select
from address_tbl where 1 = 1
and address like concat(concat("%",#{kw0}),"%")
and address like concat(concat("%",#{kw1}),"%")
and address like concat(concat("%",#{kw2}),"%")

SELECT box_name, address, mar_lon as longitude, mar_lat as latitude, acos( cos( #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * pi( ) / 180 ) * cos( mar_lat * pi( ) / 180 ) * cos( #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * pi( ) / 180- mar_lon * pi( ) / 180 ) + sin(#{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * pi( ) / 180 ) * sin( mar_lat * pi( ) / 180 ) ) * 6370996.81 AS distance FROM box_tbl where acos( cos( #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * pi( ) / 180 ) * cos( mar_lat * pi( ) / 180 ) * cos( #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * pi( ) / 180- mar_lon * pi( ) / 180 ) + sin(#{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} * pi( ) / 180 ) * sin( mar_lat * pi( ) / 180 ) ) * 6370996.81 <= 300 ORDER BY distance ASC limit 3
